name: -webkit-marquee-direction
description: Specifies the direction of motion for a marquee box.
syntax: -webkit-marquee-direction: ahead | auto | backwards | down | forwards | left | reverse | right | up;

ahead.description: The marquee moves from bottom to top.

auto.description: The marquee moves in the default direction.

backwards.description: The marquee moves from right to left.

down.description: The marquee moves from bottom to top.

forwards.description: The marquee moves from left to right.

left.description: The marquee moves from right to left.

reverse.description: The marquee moves from top to bottom.

right.description: The marquee moves from left to right.

up.description: The marquee moves from bottom to top.
